ns2:test-suite.name: Verify Login Scenarios on Facebook React Native Mobile App
ns2:test-suite.title: Verify Login Scenarios on Facebook React Native Mobile App

test-case.name: User should be able to login using valid credentials to Facebook Mobile App
test-case.title: User should be able to login using valid credentials to Facebook Mobile App

test-case.name: User should not be able to login with invalid credentials to Facebook Mobile App
